name: 嚴建隆
objective:
本課程讓學生學習各類機械的製造工作圖面必須具備正確明晰的條件材料的準備 
           至成品的組合檢驗出場。
(1) 機械工作法與製圖。
(2) 表面符號與公差配合。
(3) 常用機件。
This course allows students to learn the manufacture of various types of machinery. The working drawings must have correct and clear conditions, the preparation of materials, and the combination inspection of finished products.
(1) Mechanical working method and drawing.
(2) Surface symbols and tolerances fit.
(3) Common parts.
